ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry

Class CompositeGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry.AbstractGeometry
      • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry.CompositeGeometry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bounded3, SceneElement, VisibilityFunction3, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstructiveSolidGeometry

    public class CompositeGeometry
extends AbstractGeometry
    A SceneElement that is composed of component geometries.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • intersect

        public void intersect(int index,
                      Ray3 ray,
                      IntersectionRecorder recorder)
        Description copied from interface: SceneElement
        Computes the intersections between a given ray and the specified primitive.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the primitive with which to compute intersections.
        ray - A Ray3 to intersect with the specified primitive.
